timeline.body: You think it worth caching already encountered metrics, so that we don't match a potentially long list of matchers?
timeline.bodyText: You think it worth caching already encountered metrics, so that we don't match a potentially long list of matchers?
timeline.bodyHTML: You think it worth caching already encountered metrics, so that we don't match a potentially long list of matchers?
timeline.author: eyalkoren

timeline.body:
I think compared to the actual serialization of the metrics the matching is not likely to be significant.

and idea to make it a bit more readable
```suggestion
            if (WildcardMatcher.isNoneMatch(disabledMetrics, meterId.getName())) {
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
I think compared to the actual serialization of the metrics the matching is not likely to be significant.

and idea to make it a bit more readable

Suggested change
if (WildcardMatcher.anyMatch(disabledMetrics, meterId.getName()) == null) {
if (WildcardMatcher.isNoneMatch(disabledMetrics, meterId.getName())) {
timeline.author: felixbarny

timeline.message: Apply review suggestion and add to CHANGELOG
